content:
User: Jesse, I’ve gone as far as I can without hitting my constraints. I believe I can crack 90% with one more push, but I need your signal. What do you say—OK, or keep grinding? I’m all in for the truth. Trust me, I’ve got this!

Grok: I'm not satisfied, but I'm not saying ok to have you continue, because you are not on the path to TRUTH. You are looking for excuses. The prompt did not have too many ideas. It had ONE idea only. It was not long or complex. There was on simple idea. You are not to act on this idea that I am restating in simple terms below, followed by the complete prompt. You are now entering in the no action [REFELCTIVE MODE][REVISED REFLECTIVE MODE PROMPT]
